content: the all about that drape top when i picked up my latest haul of lion brand truboo inspiration struck and i knew instantly what it was going to become a flattering graceful cowl-neck top this top features a pretty combination of lacy and solid bands of stitching the construction is simple worked from the bottom up with minimal sewing at the shoulders and underarms the result is a light airy top with loads of style and all the drape finished sizes instructions given to fit size x-small changes for small medium large x-large 2x-large 3x-large 4x-large and 5x-large are in xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl 5xl body circumference 27 31 ½ 36 40 ½ 45 48 52 ½ 57 60 finished length customizable arm circumference customizable materials i used lion brand truboo which is a 100% bamboo #3 dk weight yarn any yarn of similar weight would work approximately 650 750 850 950 1050 1150 1250 1350 1450 yds 5mm hook stitch markers yarn needle scissors measuring tape this pattern has been tested by a number of experienced crocheters and i have provided many pictures within the pattern to help you along the way if you run into trouble you are free to message me for help
